name: BioTech Inc.
description:
Welcome to BioTec Inc, Marine.

We're the biggest biotic technology company in the world, and we are glad to have you with us.

One of our labs had one chemical leak that led to a big accident and no one in the lab survived.

Marine, your asignment is simple, reach the mainframe and start the decontamination for the lab.

The air on the lab is very toxic, so we are providing you a suit and a energy weapon, the power on your suit is limited, you'll have to balance your life support and the ammo using one of the many terminals spread through the lab, you'll also find power cells through the lab.

Thank you and good luck.

Controls:
Mouse - Aim+shoot
WASD - Move character
E/Space - Interact with the terminal
Esc - Exit Game
